verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%> and to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Take <S%H5375><s%> the sum <S%H7218><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath <S%H6955><s%> from among <S%H8432><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi, <S%H3878><s%> after their families, <S%H4940><s%> by the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers, <S%H1><s%>

From thirty <S%H7970><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%> even until <S%H5704><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old, <S%H1121><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that enter <S%H935><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the host, <S%H6635><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> the work <S%H4399><s%> in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation. <S%H4150><s%>

This <S%H2063><s%> shall be the service <S%H5656><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath <S%H6955><s%> in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> about the most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%> things:

And when the camp <S%H4264><s%> sets <S%H5265><s%> forward, <S%H5265><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> shall come, <S%H935><s%> and his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and they shall take <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> the covering <S%H4539><s%> veil, <S%H6532><s%> and cover <S%H3680><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of testimony <S%H5715><s%> with it:

And shall put <S%H5414><s%> thereon <S%H5921><s%> the covering <S%H3681><s%> of badgers' <S%H8476><s%> skins, <S%H5785><s%> and shall spread <S%H6566><s%> over <S%H4605><s%> it a cloth <S%H899><s%> wholly <S%H3632><s%> of blue, <S%H8504><s%> and shall put <S%H7760><s%> in the staves <S%H905><s%> thereof.

And on the table <S%H7979><s%> of show bread <S%H6440><s%> they shall spread <S%H6566><s%> a cloth <S%H899><s%> of blue, <S%H8504><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> thereon <S%H5921><s%> the dishes, <S%H7086><s%> and the spoons, <S%H3709><s%> and the bowls, <S%H4518><s%> and covers <S%H7184><s%> to cover <S%H5258><s%> with: and the continual <S%H8548><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> shall be thereon: <S%H5921><s%>

And they shall spread <S%H6566><s%> on them a cloth <S%H899><s%> of scarlet, <S%H8144><s%> <S%H8438><s%> and cover <S%H3680><s%> the same <S%H853><s%> with a covering <S%H4372><s%> of badgers' <S%H8476><s%> skins, <S%H5785><s%> and shall put <S%H7760><s%> in the staves <S%H905><s%> thereof.

And they shall take <S%H3947><s%> a cloth <S%H899><s%> of blue, <S%H8504><s%> and cover <S%H3680><s%> the candlestick <S%H4501><s%> of the light, <S%H3974><s%> and his lamps, <S%H5216><s%> and his tongs, <S%H4457><s%> and his firepans, <S%H4289><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the oil <S%H8081><s%> vessels <S%H3627><s%> thereof, with which <S%H834><s%> they minister <S%H8334><s%> to it:

And they shall put <S%H5414><s%> it and all <S%H3605><s%> the vessels <S%H3627><s%> thereof within <S%H413><s%> a covering <S%H4372><s%> of badgers' <S%H8476><s%> skins, <S%H5785><s%> and shall put <S%H5414><s%> it on a bar. <S%H4132><s%>

And on the golden <S%H2091><s%> altar <S%H4196><s%> they shall spread <S%H6566><s%> a cloth <S%H899><s%> of blue, <S%H8504><s%> and cover <S%H3680><s%> it with a covering <S%H4372><s%> of badgers' <S%H8476><s%> skins, <S%H5785><s%> and shall put <S%H7725><s%> to the staves <S%H905><s%> thereof:

And they shall take <S%H3947><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the instruments <S%H3627><s%> of ministry, <S%H8335><s%> with which <S%H834><s%> they minister <S%H8334><s%> in the sanctuary, <S%H6944><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> them in a cloth <S%H899><s%> of blue, <S%H8504><s%> and cover <S%H3680><s%> them with a covering <S%H4372><s%> of badgers' <S%H8476><s%> skins, <S%H5785><s%> and shall put <S%H5414><s%> them on <S%H5921><s%> a bar: <S%H4132><s%>
And they shall take away the ashes <S%H1878><s%> from the altar, <S%H4196><s%> and spread <S%H6566><s%> a purple <S%H713><s%> cloth <S%H899><s%> thereon: <S%H5921><s%>

And they shall put <S%H5414><s%> on it all <S%H3605><s%> the vessels <S%H3627><s%> thereof, with which <S%H834><s%> they minister <S%H8334><s%> about <S%H5921><s%> it, even the censers, <S%H4289><s%> the meat hooks, <S%H4207><s%> and the shovels, <S%H3257><s%> and the basins, <S%H4219><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the vessels <S%H3627><s%> of the altar; <S%H4196><s%> and they shall spread <S%H6566><s%> on it a covering <S%H3681><s%> of badgers' <S%H8476><s%> skins, <S%H5785><s%> and put <S%H7760><s%> to the staves <S%H905><s%> of it.

And when Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> have made an end <S%H3615><s%> of covering <S%H3680><s%> the sanctuary, <S%H6944><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the vessels <S%H3627><s%> of the sanctuary, <S%H6944><s%> as the camp <S%H4264><s%> is to set <S%H5265><s%> forward; <S%H5265><s%> after <S%H310><s%> that, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath <S%H6955><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> to bear <S%H5375><s%> it: but they shall not touch <S%H5060><s%> any holy <S%H6944><s%> thing, lest they die. <S%H4191><s%> These <S%H428><s%> things are the burden <S%H4853><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath <S%H6955><s%> in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation. <S%H4150><s%>

And to the office <S%H6486><s%> of Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> pertains the oil <S%H8081><s%> for the light, <S%H3974><s%> and the sweet <S%H5561><s%> incense, <S%H7004><s%> and the daily <S%H8548><s%> meat offering, <S%H4503><s%> and the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil, <S%H8081><s%> and the oversight <S%H6486><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%> and of all <S%H3605><s%> that therein is, in the sanctuary, <S%H6944><s%> and in the vessels <S%H3627><s%> thereof.
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%> and to Aaron <S%H175><s%>saying, <S%H559><s%>
Cut <S%H3772><s%> you not off the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Kohathites <S%H6956><s%> from among <S%H8432><s%> the Levites: <S%H3881><s%>

But thus do <S%H6213><s%> to them, that they may live, <S%H2421><s%> and not die, <S%H4191><s%> when they approach <S%H5066><s%> to the most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%> things: Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> shall go <S%H935><s%> in, and appoint <S%H7760><s%> them every <S%H376><s%> one <S%H376><s%> to his service <S%H5656><s%> and to his burden: <S%H4853><s%>
But they shall not go <S%H935><s%> in to see <S%H7200><s%> when the holy <S%H6944><s%> things are covered, <S%H1104><s%> lest they die. <S%H4191><s%>
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Take <S%H5375><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> the sum <S%H7218><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gershon, <S%H1647><s%> throughout the houses <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers, <S%H1><s%> by their families; <S%H4940><s%>

From thirty <S%H7970><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> shall you number <S%H6485><s%> them; all <S%H3605><s%> that enter <S%H935><s%> in to perform <S%H6633><s%> the service, <S%H5656><s%> to do <S%H5647><s%> the work <S%H5656><s%> in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation. <S%H4150><s%>
This <S%H2063><s%> is the service <S%H5656><s%> of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Gershonites, <S%H1649><s%> to serve, <S%H5647><s%> and for burdens: <S%H4853><s%>

And they shall bear <S%H5375><s%> the curtains <S%H3407><s%> of the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%> and the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> his covering, <S%H4372><s%> and the covering <S%H4372><s%> of the badgers' <S%H8476><s%> skins that is above <S%H4605><s%> on it, and the hanging <S%H4539><s%> for the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%>

And the hangings <S%H7050><s%> of the court, <S%H2691><s%> and the hanging <S%H4539><s%> for the door <S%H6607><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> of the court, <S%H2691><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is by the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> and by the altar <S%H4196><s%> round <S%H5439><s%> about, and their cords, <S%H4340><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the instruments <S%H3627><s%> of their service, <S%H5656><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that is made <S%H6213><s%> for them: so shall they serve. <S%H5647><s%>

At the appointment <S%H6310><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> shall be all <S%H3605><s%> the service <S%H5656><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the Gershonites, <S%H1649><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> their burdens, <S%H4853><s%> and in all <S%H3605><s%> their service: <S%H5656><s%> and you shall appoint <S%H6485><s%> to them in charge <S%H4931><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> their burdens. <S%H4853><s%>

This <S%H2063><s%> is the service <S%H5656><s%> of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gershon <S%H1647><s%> in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation: <S%H4150><s%> and their charge <S%H4931><s%> shall be under the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Ithamar <S%H385><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest. <S%H3548><s%>
As for the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Merari, <S%H4847><s%> you shall number <S%H6485><s%> them after their families, <S%H4940><s%> by the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers; <S%H1><s%>

From thirty <S%H7970><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%> even to fifty <S%H2572><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> shall you number <S%H6485><s%> them, every <S%H3605><s%> one that enters <S%H935><s%> into the service, <S%H6635><s%> to do <S%H5647><s%> the work <S%H5656><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation. <S%H4150><s%>

And this <S%H2063><s%> is the charge <S%H4931><s%> of their burden, <S%H4853><s%> according to all <S%H3605><s%> their service <S%H5656><s%> in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation; <S%H4150><s%> the boards <S%H7175><s%> of the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%> and the bars <S%H1280><s%> thereof, and the pillars <S%H5982><s%> thereof, and sockets <S%H134><s%> thereof,

And the pillars <S%H5982><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%> round <S%H5439><s%> about, and their sockets, <S%H134><s%> and their pins, <S%H3489><s%> and their cords, <S%H4340><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> their instruments, <S%H3627><s%> and with all <S%H3605><s%> their service: <S%H5656><s%> and by name <S%H8034><s%> you shall reckon <S%H6485><s%> the instruments <S%H3627><s%> of the charge <S%H4931><s%> of their burden. <S%H4853><s%>

This <S%H2063><s%> is the service <S%H5656><s%> of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Merari, <S%H4847><s%> according to all <S%H3605><s%> their service, <S%H5656><s%> in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> under the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Ithamar <S%H385><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest. <S%H3548><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> and the chief <S%H5387><s%> of the congregation <S%H5712><s%> numbered <S%H6485><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the Kohathites <S%H6956><s%> after their families, <S%H4940><s%> and after the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers, <S%H1><s%>

From thirty <S%H7970><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%> even to fifty <S%H2572><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old, <S%H1121><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> one that enters <S%H935><s%> into the service, <S%H6635><s%> for the work <S%H5656><s%> in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation: <S%H4150><s%>
And those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them by their families <S%H4940><s%> were two thousand <S%H505><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty. <S%H2572><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> were they that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Kohathites, <S%H6956><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that might do <S%H5647><s%> service <S%H5647><s%> in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> did number <S%H6485><s%> according <S%H5921><s%> to the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Moses. <S%H4872><s%>
And those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gershon, <S%H1647><s%> throughout their families, <S%H4940><s%> and by the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers, <S%H1><s%>

Even those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, throughout their families, <S%H4940><s%> by the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers, <S%H1><s%> were two thousand <S%H505><s%> and six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and thirty. <S%H7970><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are they that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gershon, of all <S%H3605><s%> that might do <S%H5647><s%> service <S%H5647><s%> in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> did number <S%H6485><s%> according <S%H5921><s%> to the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Merari, <S%H4847><s%> throughout their families, <S%H4940><s%> by the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers, <S%H1><s%>

Even those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them after their families, <S%H4940><s%> were three <S%H7969><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and two hundred. <S%H3967><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> be those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Merari, <S%H4847><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> numbered <S%H6485><s%> according <S%H5921><s%> to the word <S%H6310><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> and the chief <S%H5387><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> numbered, <S%H6485><s%> after their families, <S%H4940><s%> and after the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers, <S%H1><s%>

From thirty <S%H7970><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%> even to fifty <S%H2572><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old, <S%H1121><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> one that came <S%H935><s%> to do <S%H5647><s%> the service <S%H5656><s%> of the ministry, <S%H5656><s%> and the service <S%H5656><s%> of the burden <S%H4853><s%> in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation. <S%H4150><s%>
Even those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, were eight <S%H8083><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fourscore, <S%H8084><s%>

According <S%H5921><s%> to the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> they were numbered <S%H6485><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Moses, <S%H4872><s%> every <S%H376><s%> one <S%H376><s%> according <S%H5921><s%> to his service, <S%H5656><s%> and according <S%H5921><s%> to his burden: <S%H4853><s%> thus were they numbered <S%H6485><s%> of him, as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>
